ind_learners_faq_list.question: When will I know if my class time is confirmed?
ind_learners_faq_list.answer: You will receive an email a week before the class start date with a final confirmation of the class time.

ind_learners_faq_list.question: What is the cost of the classes?
ind_learners_faq_list.answer: Classes cost a minimum of $100, however, we do offer fee waivers if you are unable to pay the class fees.

ind_learners_faq_list.question: Where can I find more information regarding  the class curriculum?
ind_learners_faq_list.answer: You can learn more in our syllabi's.

ind_learners_faq_list.question: Can I enroll my students in multiple classes? Can I enroll my students in multiple classes?
ind_learners_faq_list.answer: Yes, there is no limit to the amount of classes you may enroll your student in.

upcoming_courses_question: When will more courses be offered?
upcoming_courses_answer:
We are planning on launching more courses including:

* Basic Scratch (K-3) Part 2
* Project-Based Learning Scratch (3rd-8th)
* Advanced Python (6th-8th)
* Advanced CAD with Fusion 360 (6th-8th)
* HTML/CSS (5th-8th)
* Java (6th - 8th)

​These courses will be offered in the Summer session of 2021 starting (insert date)
